content: One of Non-Pure's most common attacks will be jogging up to you before thrusting his spade forward. A moment later, he'll perform a flourish as he twirls his body so that the weapon's shaft rests on his shoulder, and then spin his body quickly to perform a follow-up horizontal slice.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Inner Courtyard' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Non-Pure'.
The content is as follows:
One of Non-Pure's most common attacks will be jogging up to you before thrusting his spade forward. A moment later, he'll perform a flourish as he twirls his body so that the weapon's shaft rests on his shoulder, and then spin his body quickly to perform a follow-up horizontal slice.
